name: 蕭榮修
objective:
介紹嵌入式計算系統設計原理,使學生瞭解如何使用計算機軟、硬體
為元件來設計嵌入式計算系統。
1.嵌入式計算系統簡介
2.指令集
3.中央處理器
4.嵌入式計算平台
5.程式設計與分析
6.程序與作業系統
7.硬體加速器
8.網路與分散式嵌入式系統
9.系統設計方法
schedule:
1. Course introduction
2. Embedded Computing — Introduction, Embedded System-on-Chip (SoC), Design Process
3. Embedded Hardware: Embedded Processors
4. Embedded Hardware: Introduction Set
5. Embedded Computing Platform
6. Embedded Software: Boot Loader
7. Embedded Software: Embedded OS
8. Embedded Software: Device Drivers
9. Mid-term Exam
10. Program Design and Analysis
11. Middleware and Application Software
12. Hardware Accelerators
13. Network-Aware Systems
14. System Design Techniques
15. Term project
16. Term project
17. Term project
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Assignments (reading and lab reports): 50%
2. Mid-term Exam: 25%
3. Final Exam: 25%
materials:
1. Computers as Components: Principles of Embedded Computing, Wayne Wolf, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, 2001. (以電腦為組件：嵌入式系統設計原理，蕭榮修譯，全華)
2. Embedded Systems: Architecture, Programming and Design, Raj Kamal, Tata McGraw Hill, 2003. (滄海) (嵌入式系統：結構、程式設計、系統設計，吳家榮譯，全華)
3. 嵌入式系統設計 ─ 以ARM處理器基礎之SOC平台，黃悅民等編著，滄海
4. XSBase 255, 270 使用安裝手冊、實驗指導手冊
